casebody.data:
In the Matter of E.F.S., Jr. No. 285P06. Supreme Court of North Carolina. June 21, 2006. Kathleen U. Baldwin, Assistant Attorney General, Robert C. Montgomery, Special Deputy Attorney General, Ben David, District Attorney, for State of NC.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 21st day of June 2006 by Respondent for Extension of Time to File Response:

*471"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference this the 21st day of June 2006."
